Just to confirm, which topics do we want to suppress from the simulation? From my understanding, we should suppress:

* All `/gazebo` namespace topics
* `/joint_states`
* Probably the `/vrx/.../shuffle` topics? \(not sure what they do, apparently from `rostopic info` they are std\_msgs/Empty. I think it just shuffles objects if msg is published, so this should be suppressed\)

We may be able to use [https://github.com/osrf/ariac-gazebo\_ros\_pkgs/commits/ariac-network-melodic](https://github.com/osrf/ariac-gazebo_ros_pkgs/commits/ariac-network-melodic) directly, as the suppressed topics are very similar.
